meta.description: Comprehensive creative community template for artists, designers, writers, musicians, and content creators

channels.name: üëã‚îÉwelcome
channels.topic: Welcome new members and community guidelines

pin.title: üëã Welcome to Our Creative Community!
pin.description: Welcome to our vibrant creative community! We're excited to have you join our talented artists, designers, writers, musicians, and creators.

fields.name: üé® What We Do
fields.value:
‚Ä¢ Share and showcase creative work
‚Ä¢ Collaborate on projects
‚Ä¢ Learn from each other
‚Ä¢ Support fellow creators
‚Ä¢ Participate in challenges and events

fields.name: üìú Community Guidelines
fields.value:
‚Ä¢ Be respectful and supportive
‚Ä¢ Give constructive feedback
‚Ä¢ Credit original work
‚Ä¢ Keep content appropriate
‚Ä¢ Follow Discord's Terms of Service

fields.name: üéØ Getting Started
fields.value:
‚Ä¢ Read #community-guidelines
‚Ä¢ Get your roles in #role-selection
‚Ä¢ Introduce yourself in #introductions
‚Ä¢ Share your work in appropriate channels

channels.name: üìú‚îÉcommunity-guidelines
channels.topic: Detailed community guidelines and rules

pin.title: üìú Community Guidelines
pin.description: Please read and follow these guidelines to maintain a positive and supportive creative environment.

fields.name: ü§ù Respect & Support
fields.value:
‚Ä¢ **Be Kind:** Treat all members with respect and kindness
‚Ä¢ **Constructive Feedback:** Provide helpful, constructive criticism
‚Ä¢ **Encourage Growth:** Support fellow creators in their journey
‚Ä¢ **No Harassment:** Bullying, trolling, or harassment will not be tolerated

fields.name: üé® Art & Content
fields.value:
‚Ä¢ **Original Work:** Only share your own work or with proper credit
‚Ä¢ **Appropriate Content:** Keep content suitable for all ages
‚Ä¢ **No Spam:** Avoid excessive posting or self-promotion
‚Ä¢ **Quality Content:** Share meaningful and relevant creative work

fields.name: üí¨ Communication
fields.value:
‚Ä¢ **Stay On Topic:** Use channels for their intended purpose
‚Ä¢ **No Spam:** Avoid excessive messages or emojis
‚Ä¢ **Respect Privacy:** Don't share personal information
‚Ä¢ **Language:** Keep language appropriate and friendly

fields.name: ‚öñÔ∏è Enforcement
fields.value:
‚Ä¢ **Warnings:** First offense usually results in a warning
‚Ä¢ **Timeouts:** Temporary restrictions for repeated offenses
‚Ä¢ **Bans:** Permanent removal for severe violations
‚Ä¢ **Appeals:** Contact staff if you believe you were treated unfairly

footer.text: These guidelines help us maintain a positive creative community!

channels.name: üëã‚îÉintroductions

pin.title: üëã Introduce Yourself!
pin.description: Welcome to our creative community! Tell us about yourself and your creative journey.

fields.name: üìù Introduction Format
fields.value:
‚Ä¢ **Name/Alias:** What should we call you?
‚Ä¢ **Creative Medium:** What do you create?
‚Ä¢ **Experience Level:** Beginner, intermediate, or professional?
‚Ä¢ **Inspiration:** What inspires your creativity?
‚Ä¢ **Goals:** What do you hope to achieve here?

fields.name: üé® Share Your Work
fields.value: Feel free to share a piece of your work that represents your style!

fields.name: ü§ù Connect
fields.value: Let us know how we can help you grow as a creator!
